Package revxrsal.commands.bukkit

Interface BukkitCommandActor

All Superinterfaces:
CommandActor
All Known Implementing Classes:
BukkitActor
public interface BukkitCommandActor extends CommandActor
Represents a Bukkit CommandActor that wraps CommandSender

    • audience

      @NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.audience.Audience audience()
      Returns the Audience of this sender.

      NOTE: This requires calling BukkitCommandHandler.enableAdventure() or BukkitCommandHandler.enableAdventure(BukkitAudiences).

      Returns:
      The audience of this sender
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if enableAdventure was not called.

    • reply
